name: react-simple-qr-code-scanner
description: A super simple qr code scanner

scripts.publish:beta: pnpm run prepublish && npm publish ./packages/react-simple-qr-code-scanner/ --tag beta
scripts.publish:alpha: pnpm run prepublish && npm publish ./packages/react-simple-qr-code-scanner/ --tag alpha
scripts.prepublish: pnpm i && nx build react-simple-qr-code-scanner && cp README.md ./packages/react-simple-qr-code-scanner/README.md && cp LICENSE ./packages/react-simple-qr-code-scanner/LICENSE
